About

I am an Assistant Professor in Financial Engineering at Reykjavik University. Previously, I was a Senior Lecturer in Mathematical Finance at the University of Cape Town.

I have the priviledge of working with some amazing researchers around the world:

  • Alex Backwell
  • Jörg Kienitz
  • Eric Schlögl
  • David Glavind Skovmand
